notesStmt.note: Folio missing after folio 125. Slightly stained.

Folio 205-206 belonged originally to a different manuscript. Mosheh Rofe ben Mosheh ha-Melamed: inscribed under the titles of most of the Muḳadimat, e.g. folio 56r. Yosef ha-Rofe ben Mosheh ha-Rofe: inscribed, folio 125v. Birth entry of Avraham, dated 5603 (1842): folio 111v .
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Volume 1 of the Muḳadimat, or introductions (in Arabic and Hebrew), to the weekly parashiyot of the Pentateuch, by Shemu᾿el ha-Rofe al-Maghribi.

collation.p: Quires of mostly 6 or 8 leaves each (irregular).

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Square and semi-cursive Oriental scripts of the 17th to 18th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine title: 'Samuel ha-Rofe. Mukaddimat. Vol. I. Arabic & Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2485.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), a antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 July 1882: inscribed, folio [207v].
